verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Take<WH5358> full<WH5360> vengeance<WH5360> for the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> on the Midianites;<WH4084> afterward<WH310> you will be gathered<WH622> to your people.<WH9415>"

And Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "Arm<WH9139> men<WH376> from among<WH854> you for the war,<WH6635> that they may go<WH1961> against<WH5921> Midian,<WH4080> to execute<WH5414> the Lord's vengeance<WH5360> on Midian.<WH4080>
"A thousand<WH505> from each tribe<WH4294> of all<WH3605> the tribes<WH4294> of Israel<WH3478> you shall send<WH7971> to the war.<WH6635>"
So there were furnished<WH4560> from the thousands<WH505> of Israel,<WH3478> a thousand<WH505> from each tribe,<WH4294> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> thousand<WH505> armed<WH9139> for war.<WH6635>

And Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> them, a thousand<WH505> from each tribe,<WH4294> to the war,<WH6635> and Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> to the war<WH6635> with them, and the holy<WH6944> vessels<WH3627> and the trumpets<WH2689> for the alarm<WH8643> in his hand.<WH3027>
So they made<WH6633> war<WH6633> against<WH5921> Midian,<WH4080> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> and they killed<WH2026> every<WH3605> male.<WH2145>

And they killed<WH2026> the kings<WH4428> of Midian<WH4080> along<WH5921> with the [rest of] their slain:<WH2491> Evi<WH189> and Rekem<WH7552> and Zur<WH6698> and Hur<WH2354> and Reba,<WH7254> the five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of Midian;<WH4080> they also killed<WH2026> Balaam<WH1109> the son<WH1121> of Beor<WH1160> with the sword.<WH2719>

And the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> captured<WH7617> the women<WH802> of Midian<WH4080> and their little<WH2945> ones;<WH2945> and all<WH3605> their cattle<WH929> and all<WH3605> their flocks<WH4735> and all<WH3605> their goods,<WH2428> they plundered.<WH962>
Then they burned<WH8313> all<WH3605> their cities<WH5892> where<WH4186> they lived<WH4186> and all<WH3605> their camps<WH2918> with fire.<WH784>
And they took<WH3947> all<WH3605> the spoil<WH7998> and all<WH3605> the prey,<WH4455> both of man<WH120> and of beast.<WH929>

And they brought<WH935> the captives<WH7628> and the prey<WH4455> and the spoil<WH7998> to Moses,<WH4872> and to Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> and to the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to the camp<WH4264> at the plains<WH6160> of Moab,<WH4124> which<WH834> are by the Jordan<WH3383> opposite Jericho.<WH3405>

And Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> and all<WH3605> the leaders<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> went<WH3318> out to meet<WH7122> them outside<WH413> <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp.<WH4264>

And Moses<WH4872> was angry<WH7107> with the officers<WH6485> of the army,<WH2428> the captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and the captains<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> who had come<WH935> from service<WH6635> in the war.<WH4421>
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, "Have you spared<WH2421> all<WH3605> the women<WH5347>?

"Behold,<WH2005> these<WH2007> caused<WH1961> the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> through the counsel<WH1697> of Balaam,<WH1109> to trespass<WH4560> <WH4604> against the Lord<WH3068> in the matter<WH1697> of Peor,<WH6465> so the plague<WH4046> was among the congregation<WH5712> of the Lord.<WH3068>

"Now<WH6258> therefore, kill<WH2026> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> among the little<WH2945> ones,<WH2945> and kill<WH2026> every<WH3605> woman<WH802> who has known<WH3045> man<WH376> intimately.<WH4904> <WH2145>
"But all<WH3605> the girls<WH2945> <WH802> who<WH834> have not known<WH3045> man<WH2145> intimately,<WH4904> <WH2145> spare<WH2421> for yourselves.

"And you, camp<WH2583> outside<WH4480> <WH2351> the camp<WH4264> seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> whoever<WH3605> has killed<WH2026> any person,<WH5315> and whoever<WH3605> has touched<WH5060> any slain,<WH2491> purify<WH2398> yourselves, you and your captives,<WH7628> on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> and on the seventh<WH7637> day.<WH3117>

"And you shall purify<WH2398> for yourselves every<WH3605> garment<WH899> and every<WH3605> article<WH3627> of leather<WH5785> and all<WH3605> the work<WH4639> of goats' [hair,] and all<WH3605> articles<WH3627> of wood.<WH6086>"

Then Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> said<WH559> to the men<WH376> of war<WH6635> who had gone<WH935> to battle,<WH4421> "This<WH2088> is the statute<WH2708> of the law<WH8451> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> has commanded<WH6680> Moses: <WH4872>
only<WH389> the gold<WH2091> and the silver,<WH3701> the bronze,<WH5178> the iron,<WH1270> the tin<WH913> and the lead,<WH5777>

everything<WH3605> that can stand<WH935> the fire,<WH784> you shall pass<WH5674> through<WH5674> the fire,<WH784> and it shall be clean,<WH2891> but it shall be purified<WH2398> with water<WH4325> for impurity.<WH5079> But whatever<WH3605> <WH834> cannot<WH3808> stand<WH935> the fire<WH784> you shall pass<WH5674> through<WH5674> the water.<WH4325>
"And you shall wash<WH3526> your clothes<WH899> on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> and be clean,<WH2891> and afterward<WH310> you may enter<WH935> the camp.<WH4264>"
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"You and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers' [households] of the congregation,<WH5712> take<WH5375> a count<WH7218> of the booty<WH4455> that was captured,<WH7628> both of man<WH120> and of animal;<WH929>
and divide<WH2673> the booty<WH4455> between<WH996> the warriors<WH4421> who went<WH3318> out to battle<WH4421> and all<WH3605> the congregation.<WH5712>

"And levy<WH7311> a tax<WH4371> for the Lord<WH3068> from the men<WH376> of war<WH4421> who went<WH3318> out to battle,<WH4421> one<WH259> in five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> of the persons<WH120> and of the cattle<WH1241> and of the donkeys<WH2543> and of the sheep;<WH6629>
take<WH3947> it from their half<WH4276> and give<WH5414> it to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> as an offering<WH8641> to the Lord.<WH3068>

"And from the sons<WH1121> of Israel's half,<WH4276> you shall take<WH3947> one<WH259> drawn<WH270> out of every fifty<WH2572> of the persons,<WH120> of the cattle,<WH1241> of the donkeys<WH2543> and of the sheep,<WH6629> from all<WH3605> the animals,<WH929> and give<WH5414> them to the Levites<WH3881> who keep<WH8104> charge<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Lord.<WH3068>"
And Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> did<WH6213> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
Now the booty<WH4455> that remained<WH1961> <WH3499> from the spoil<WH957> which<WH834> the men<WH5971> of war<WH6635> had plundered<WH962> was 675000 sheep,<WH6629>
and 72000 cattle,<WH1241>
and 61000 donkeys,<WH2543>
and of human<WH120> beings,<WH5315> of the women<WH802> who<WH834> had not known<WH3045> man<WH2145> intimately,<WH4904> <WH2145> all<WH3605> the persons<WH5315> were 32000.
And the half,<WH4275> the portion<WH2506> of those who went<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635> was [as follows: ] the number<WH4557> of sheep<WH6629> was 337500,
and the Lord's levy<WH4371> of the sheep<WH6629> was 675,
and the cattle<WH1241> were 36000, from which the Lord's levy<WH4371> was 72.<WH8147> <WH7657>
And the donkeys<WH2543> were 30500, from which the Lord's levy<WH4371> was 61.<WH259> <WH8346>
And the human<WH120> beings<WH5315> were 16000, from whom the Lord's levy<WH4371> was 32<WH8147> <WH7970> persons.<WH5315>
And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> the levy<WH4371> [which was] the Lord<WH3068>'s offering<WH8641> to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> just<WH9201> as the Lord had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
As for the sons<WH1121> of Israel's half,<WH4276> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> separated<WH2673> from the men<WH376> who had gone<WH6633> to war<WH6633> –
now the congregation's half<WH4275> was 337500 sheep,<WH6629>
and 36000 cattle,<WH1241>
and 30500 donkeys,<WH2543>
and the human<WH120> beings<WH5315> were 16000 –

and from the sons<WH1121> of Israel's half,<WH4276> Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> one<WH259> drawn<WH270> out of every fifty,<WH2572> both<WH4480> of man<WH120> and of animals,<WH929> and gave<WH5414> them to the Levites,<WH3881> who kept<WH8104> charge<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Lord,<WH3068> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

Then the officers<WH6485> who<WH834> were over the thousands<WH505> of the army,<WH6635> the captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and the captains<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> approached<WH7126> Moses;<WH4872>

and they said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Your servants<WH5650> have taken<WH5375> a census<WH7218> of men<WH376> of war<WH4421> who<WH834> are in our charge,<WH3027> and no<WH3808> man<WH376> of us is missing.<WH6485>

"So we have brought<WH7126> as an offering<WH7133> to the Lord<WH3068> what<WH834> each<WH376> man<WH376> found,<WH4672> articles<WH3627> of gold,<WH2091> armlets<WH685> and bracelets,<WH6781> signet<WH2885> rings,<WH2885> earrings<WH5694> and necklaces,<WH3558> to make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for ourselves<WH5315> before<WH6440> the Lord.<WH3068>"
And Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the gold<WH2091> from them, all<WH3605> kinds of wrought<WH4639> articles.<WH3627>

And all<WH3605> the gold<WH2091> of the offering<WH8641> which<WH834> they offered<WH7311> up to the Lord,<WH3068> from the captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and the captains<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> was 16750 shekels.<WH8255>
The men<WH376> of war<WH6635> had taken<WH962> booty,<WH962> every<WH376> man<WH376> for himself.

So Moses<WH4872> and Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the gold<WH2091> from the captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and of hundreds,<WH3967> and brought<WH935> it to the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> as a memorial<WH2146> for the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> before<WH6440> the Lord.<WH3068>
